title: Darooghe
author: Darooghe
content: Hello,I am looking for an app to track my pools and staked farms. Something like https://app.apy.vision/ but free.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: All 3 are definitely good, but I personally prefer Zapper. They'll most likely scrape everything probably unless you're farming on obscure platforms.https://zapper.fi/https://zerion.io/https://debank.com/

comments.author: Darooghe
comments.body: Quote from: mk4 on July 24, 2022, 02:41:32 PMAll 3 are definitely good, but I personally prefer Zapper. They'll most likely scrape everything probably unless you're farming on obscure platforms.https://zapper.fi/https://zerion.io/https://debank.com/How to find Liquidity pool gains, fee earnings and Net market gains on these apps? apy.vision has these features.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: Darooghe on July 24, 2022, 09:07:32 PMHow to find Liquidity pool gains, fee earnings and Net market gains on these apps? apy.vision has these features.Oh. If you want data that specific, then I'm afraid you're stuck with apy.vision for now.You can also make a feature suggestion to the three I've mentioned, but you're going to need to wait.
